name: Imperator
description:
Imperator is a strategy game based on Risk for two up to five players. The game consists three play options: goal, the whole world, as much as possible. The first type of the gameplay starts from drawing the goals, which must be realized and deploy armies in the selected countries. The second one requires conquering of the world and the last one takes selected number of turns, where the players with the highest number of countries wins the game.

At the beginning computer draws starting countries for each player. If the division of 42 countries is uneven, the player receives special cards - jokers. The game is divided into three stages: battle, displacement of the army and army deployment. The battle result depends on army strength and dice rolling. The units may be displaced by crossing maximum 12 borders per turn. In the last stage unused army may be deployed on selected continent.

The gameplay may be enhanced by adding energy of the army (1-20) and movement restrictions (1 point army can't be displaced).
